column5: You will experience a peaceful setting with a full-size kitchen, fire pit, propane grill, easy access to the river, relax on the deck watching the sunset & wildlife, visit local wineries, The Square, lavender gardens, etc.   Breakfast is served.   This is a residential neighborhood, so we always try to be respectful of our neighbors and do not have loud talking outside after 10-10:30 pm. We want this to be peaceful for everyone. We welcome you to our home and look forward to meeting you.
column8: Campfire Dreams - River access & gorgeous sunsets
